title: Coconut tart with spiced rum pineapple
description: Sweet and simple, this coconut tart is served with pineapple pieces in a zingy rum and chilli caramel.Equipment and preparation: You will need a 25cm/10in fluted, loose-bottomed tart tin.
ingredients: 1 red chilli, seeds removed, cut into thin strips
1 pineapple, peeled and cut into small dice
2 unwaxed lemons, juice and finely grated zest
